00033 #define RC_UPDATE_FREQ 40.
00034 #define ROLL_COEF   (STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_P     / MAX_PPRZ)
00035 #define ROLL_COEF_H  (STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_P_H     / MAX_PPRZ)
00036 #define PITCH_COEF ( STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_THETA / MAX_PPRZ)
00037 #define YAW_COEF  (STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_PSI   / MAX_PPRZ)
00038 
00039 #define ROLL_COEF_RATE  (-STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_P   / MAX_PPRZ)
00040 #define PITCH_COEF_RATE ( STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_Q / MAX_PPRZ)
00041 #define YAW_COEF_RATE ( STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_SP_MAX_R / MAX_PPRZ)
00042 
00043 #define DEADBAND_EXCEEDED(VARIABLE, VALUE) ((VARIABLE > VALUE) || (VARIABLE < -VALUE))
00044 #define APPLY_DEADBAND(VARIABLE, VALUE) (DEADBAND_EXCEEDED(VARIABLE, VALUE) ? VARIABLE : 0.0)
00045 
00046 #define ROLL_DEADBAND_EXCEEDED()            \
00047   (radio_control.values[RADIO_ROLL] >  STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_A || \
00048    radio_control.values[RADIO_ROLL] < -STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_A)
00049 #define PITCH_DEADBAND_EXCEEDED()           \
00050   (radio_control.values[RADIO_PITCH] >  STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_E || \
00051    radio_control.values[RADIO_PITCH] < -STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_E)
00052 #define YAW_DEADBAND_EXCEEDED()           \
00053   (radio_control.values[RADIO_YAW] >  STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_R || \
00054    radio_control.values[RADIO_YAW] < -STABILIZATION_ATTITUDE_FLOAT_DEADBAND_R)
00055 
00056 void stabilization_attitude_ref_enter(void);
00057 void stabilization_attitude_ref_schedule(uint8_t idx);
